Title: Enacts the End Bullying and Discrimination in Schools Everywhere (BEACON) Act
Summary: Strengthens protections against discrimination, harassment, and bullying based on actual or perceived immigration status, and to improve implementation and oversight under the Dignity for All Students Act.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to strengthening protections against discrimination, harassment, and bullying based on actual or perceived immigration status, and to improve implementation and oversight under the Dignity for All Students Act
